nodes.caption: Absence of process architecture in BB&T unit in KAUH
Improving quality and strategic planning of BB&T processes using process architecture approach
Phase 3: Designing Riva BB&T Process Architecture Iterations from 1-4 over the 7 steps of Riva method
Phase 4: Demonstrating Riva BB&T Process Architecture Iterations from 1-4 over the 7 steps of Riva method
Phase 5: Evaluating Riva BB&T Process Architecture Iterations from 1-4 over the 7 steps of Riva method
Resulted in BB&T process architecture that is communicated to domain experts to evaluate its representativeness
